message.content:
I need to identify the amount representing profit that the entity retains after all expenses have been deducted from revenue.

In a cash flow statement, this figure is typically shown as "Net Profit" (or sometimes "Net Income"), which appears at the beginning of the operating activities section and represents the entity's bottom-line profit after accounting for all revenue and expenses.

Looking at the given cash flow statement, I can see the following line item:
- Net Profit: 1290835.16 (dated 2024-02-05)

This is the value that represents the amount of profit the entity retains after all expenses have been deducted.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '1290835.16'}}
```
